channel.title: Data to Wisdom
channel.description: This is a demo site for Nikola.

item.title: Feature Selection by Visualization
item.dc:creator: Harun
item.description:
Thanks to Scikit-learn's instantiate-fit-tranform-predict template, we can run our formatted data through as many model as we like without having to continue to transform the data to fit each kind of model.

In Scikit-learn our main concern is optimazing the models.

For supervised problems,

  • we know the target so we can score the model,
  • we can easily throw the data at all different classifiers and
  • score them to find the optimal classifier.

We can automate these steps but the difficulties for automation are:

Read moreâ¦ (24 min remaining to read)

item.title: GPS Data Analysis
item.dc:creator: Harun
item.description:
In this project we will

  • analyze a gps dataset
  • try to infer some ideas mainly from the coordinates (latitude, longitude) of the data.
  • do some explanatory data analysis by filtering and grouping the data
  • look for some patterns in different time frames.

  • start analizing subject of interest from the longer time frames and follow by the shorter time frames

    Read moreâ¦ (26 min remaining to read)
